Typealiases.html#/s:18LDSwiftEventSource.name: ConnectionErrorHandler
Typealiases.html#/s:18LDSwiftEventSource.abstract: Type for a function that will be notified when the EventSource client encounters a connection failure.

Typealiases.html#/s:18LDSwiftEventSource.name: HeaderTransform
Typealiases.html#/s:18LDSwiftEventSource.abstract: Type for a function that will take in the current HTTP headers and return a new set of HTTP headers to be used when

Structs/MessageEvent.html#/s:18LDSwiftEv.name: lastEventId
Structs/MessageEvent.html#/s:18LDSwiftEv.abstract: The last seen event id, or the event id set in the Config if none have been received.

Structs/MessageEvent.html.name: MessageEvent
Structs/MessageEvent.html.abstract: Struct representing received event from the stream.

Protocols/EventHandler.html#/s:18LDSwift.name: onOpened()
Protocols/EventHandler.html#/s:18LDSwift.abstract: EventSource calls this method when the stream connection has been opened.

Protocols/EventHandler.html#/s:18LDSwift.name: onClosed()
Protocols/EventHandler.html#/s:18LDSwift.abstract: EventSource calls this method when the stream connection has been closed.

Protocols/EventHandler.html#/s:18LDSwift.name: onMessage(eventType:messageEvent:)
Protocols/EventHandler.html#/s:18LDSwift.abstract: EventSource calls this method when it has received a new event from the stream.

Protocols/EventHandler.html#/s:18LDSwift.name: onComment(comment:)
Protocols/EventHandler.html#/s:18LDSwift.abstract: EventSource calls this method when it has received a comment line from the stream.

Protocols/EventHandler.html#/s:18LDSwift.name: onError(error:)
Protocols/EventHandler.html#/s:18LDSwift.abstract: This method will be called for all exceptions that occur on the network connection (including an

Protocols/EventHandler.html.name: EventHandler
Protocols/EventHandler.html.abstract: Protocol for an object that will receive SSE events.

Enums/ReadyState.html#/s:18LDSwiftEventS.name: raw
Enums/ReadyState.html#/s:18LDSwiftEventS.abstract: The EventSource client has not been started yet.

Enums/ReadyState.html#/s:18LDSwiftEventS.name: connecting
Enums/ReadyState.html#/s:18LDSwiftEventS.abstract: The EventSource client is attempting to make a connection.

Enums/ReadyState.html#/s:18LDSwiftEventS.name: open
Enums/ReadyState.html#/s:18LDSwiftEventS.abstract: The EventSource client is active and listening for events.

Enums/ReadyState.html#/s:18LDSwiftEventS.name: closed
Enums/ReadyState.html#/s:18LDSwiftEventS.abstract: The connection has been closed or has failed, and the EventSource will attempt to reconnect.

Enums/ReadyState.html#/s:18LDSwiftEventS.name: shutdown
Enums/ReadyState.html#/s:18LDSwiftEventS.abstract: The connection has been permanently closed and the EventSource not reconnect.

Enums/ConnectionErrorAction.html#/s:18LD.name: proceed
Enums/ConnectionErrorAction.html#/s:18LD.abstract: Specifies that the error should be logged normally and dispatched to the EventHandler. Connection retrying will

Enums/ConnectionErrorAction.html#/s:18LD.name: shutdown
Enums/ConnectionErrorAction.html#/s:18LD.abstract: Specifies that the connection should be immediately shut down and not retried. The error will not be dispatched

Enums/ReadyState.html.name: ReadyState
Enums/ReadyState.html.abstract: Enum values representing the states of an EventSource

Classes/EventSource/Config.html#/s:18LDS.name: handler
Classes/EventSource/Config.html#/s:18LDS.abstract: The EventHandler called in response to activity on the stream.

Classes/EventSource/Config.html#/s:18LDS.name: url
Classes/EventSource/Config.html#/s:18LDS.abstract: The URL of the request used when connecting to the EventSource API.

Classes/EventSource/Config.html#/s:18LDS.name: method
Classes/EventSource/Config.html#/s:18LDS.abstract: The HTTP method to use for the API request.

Classes/EventSource/Config.html#/s:18LDS.name: body
Classes/EventSource/Config.html#/s:18LDS.abstract: Optional HTTP body to be included in the API request.

Classes/EventSource/Config.html#/s:18LDS.name: lastEventId
Classes/EventSource/Config.html#/s:18LDS.abstract: An initial value for the last-event-id header to be sent on the initial request

Classes/EventSource/Config.html#/s:18LDS.name: headers
Classes/EventSource/Config.html#/s:18LDS.abstract: Additional HTTP headers to be set on the request

Classes/EventSource/Config.html#/s:18LDS.name: headerTransform
Classes/EventSource/Config.html#/s:18LDS.abstract: Transform function to allow dynamically configuring the headers on each API request.

Classes/EventSource/Config.html#/s:18LDS.name: reconnectTime
Classes/EventSource/Config.html#/s:18LDS.abstract: The minimum amount of time to wait before reconnecting after a failure

Classes/EventSource/Config.html#/s:18LDS.name: maxReconnectTime
Classes/EventSource/Config.html#/s:18LDS.abstract: The maximum amount of time to wait before reconnecting after a failure

Classes/EventSource/Config.html#/s:18LDS.name: backoffResetThreshold
Classes/EventSource/Config.html#/s:18LDS.abstract: The minimum amount of time for an EventSource connection to remain open before allowing the connection

Classes/EventSource/Config.html#/s:18LDS.name: idleTimeout
Classes/EventSource/Config.html#/s:18LDS.abstract: The maximum amount of time between receiving any data before considering the connection to have timed out.

Classes/EventSource/Config.html#/s:18LDS.name: connectionErrorHandler
Classes/EventSource/Config.html#/s:18LDS.abstract: An error handler that is called when an error occurs and can shut down the client in response.

Classes/EventSource/Config.html#/s:18LDS.name: init(handler:url:)
Classes/EventSource/Config.html#/s:18LDS.abstract: Create a new configuration with an EventHandler and a URL

Classes/EventSource.html#/s:18LDSwiftEve.name: init(config:)
Classes/EventSource.html#/s:18LDSwiftEve.abstract: Initialize the EventSource client with the given configuration.

Classes/EventSource.html#/s:18LDSwiftEve.name: stop()
Classes/EventSource.html#/s:18LDSwiftEve.abstract: Shuts down the EventSource client. It is not valid to restart the client after calling this function.

Classes/EventSource.html#/s:18LDSwiftEve.name: getLastEventId()
Classes/EventSource.html#/s:18LDSwiftEve.abstract: Get the most recently received event ID, or the value of EventSource.Config.lastEventId if no event IDs have

Classes/EventSource.html.name: EventSource
Classes/EventSource.html.abstract: Provides an EventSource client for consuming Server-Sent Events.

Classes/UnsuccessfulResponseError.html.name: UnsuccessfulResponseError
Classes/UnsuccessfulResponseError.html.abstract: Error class that indicates the remote server returned an unsuccessful HTTP response code.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
